constantValues: The root entity for a portal blog.

definitions.description: The root entity for a portal blog.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the blog is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the blog is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: name

constantValues: Shows the name or title of the blog.

members.description: Shows the name or title of the blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render the archive page (for example, posts by date, tags, and so on) of the blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the page template to be used to render the archive page (for example, posts by date, tags, and so on) of the blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render the home/main page of the Blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the page template to be used to render the home/main page of the Blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render an individual Blog Post belonging to the Blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the page template to be used to render an individual Blog Post belonging to the Blog.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: commentPolicy

constantValues: Specifies the post comment policy to be used by this Blog.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'commentPolicy_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'commentPolicy'
addSupportingAttribute.name: commentPolicy_display

members.description: Specifies the post comment policy to be used by this Blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the parent webpage associated with this blog, denoting its place in the website site map.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the parent webpage associated with this blog, denoting its place in the website site map.

members.name: partialURL

constantValues: Shows the URL path fragment to be used to build a URL for this blog.

members.description: Shows the URL path fragment to be used to build a URL for this blog.

members.name: summary

constantValues: A descriptive summary of the Blog.

members.description: A descriptive summary of the Blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: websiteid

constantValues: Shows the website associated with the blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the website associated with the blog.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Option to make blog posts language specific

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Option to make blog posts language specific
